cues_en: Hip to hip, get close!

cues_en: Leg up, knee slightly bent

cues_en: Reap! Thigh to thigh, chop!

cues_en: Stay with them, arm lands first
cues_de: Dranbleiben, Arm zum Abfangen

cues_en: Create frames: one arm under neck, other across hip
cues_de: Bilde Rahmen am Hals und Hüfte

cues_en: Upa! Bridge hard to pop them up a bit
cues_de: Drücke Hüfte kraftvoll nach oben

cues_en: Upa! Bridge hard to pop them up a bit

cues_en: Shrimp your butt out to the side – make room
cues_de: Schiebe Hüfte zur Seite weg

cues_en: Shrimp your butt out to the side – make room

cues_en: Knee shield in – insert your knee to recover guard

cues_en: Pin one arm to your chest – they can't post out

cues_en: Pin one arm to your chest – they can't post out
cues_de: Greife ein Handgelenk und klemme Arm an Brust fest

cues_en: Hook their foot so they can't post a leg

cues_en: Hook their foot so they can't post a leg
cues_de: Fessele ihren gleichseitigen Fuß

cues_en: Bridge HARD straight up – get their weight off

cues_en: Now roll – turn the bridge into a big log roll
cues_de: Ohne zu zögern kippe zur eingefangenen Seite

cues_en: Bridge just enough to unbalance them and make space

cues_en: Bridge just enough to unbalance them and make space

cues_en: Sneak your elbow inside their knee

cues_de: Drücke Knie weg und mach Hüftschub zu Seite

cues_en: Knee to chest, thread it through to their guard

cues_en: Chin down, hand on their wrist – breathe and stay calm

cues_en: Forearm against their neck – don't let them re-tighten
cues_de: Platziere freien Unterarm an Seite Hals/Kiefers

cues_en: Forearm against their neck – don't let them re-tighten

cues_en: Cross-collar grip deep, opposite sleeve control

cues_en: Legs open: one shin across their chest, other leg flat

cues_en: Arm over their shoulder – get chest-to-shoulder

cues_en: Hug their arm tight so it can't post
cues_de: Klemme ihren linken Arm fest unter deiner Achsel

cues_en: Hug their arm tight so it can't post

cues_en: Pivot your body – get off to the side under armpit

cues_en: Guard open – arms under legs right away
cues_de: Öffne Guard: stehe kontrolliert auf

cues_de: Öffne Guard: kontrolliere Handgelenke, stelle Bein auf

cues_en: Underhook their leg, get a cross-collar or underhook
cues_de: Führe rechte Hand unter ihr linkes Bein

cues_en: Follow them over, secure mount, stabilize position
cues_de: Mitrollen, Mount sichern, Position stabilisieren

cues_en: Crossface, underhook far arm, drive knee onto belly
cues_de: Crossface, fernen Arm unterhaken, Knie auf Bauch drücken

cues_en: Slide knee across, hook their leg with your foot, drop hips into mount
cues_de: Knie herüberschieben, Bein einhaken, Hüfte in den Mount absenken

cues_en: Crossface, underhook far arm, drive knee onto belly
cues_de: Crossface, fernen Arm unterhaken, Knie auf Bauch drücken

cues_en: Slide knee across, hook their leg with your foot, drop hips into mount
cues_de: Knie herüberschieben, Bein einhaken, Hüfte in den Mount absenken

cues_en: Isolate one arm, shoot legs up, lock your ankles

cues_en: Grab your shin, pivot for angle, lock the choke, squeeze knees
cues_de: Schienbein greifen, Winkel einstellen, Triangle schließen, Knie zusammendrücken

cues_de: Bizeps greifen, Hand hinter den Kopf, Ellbogen zusammenziehen

title_en: One arm under, one arm over
title_de: Ein Arm unter, ein Arm über
